civics.name: Federal Budgeting & State Distribution
civics.description: This law ensures that once per hour, up to 50% of the difference in sales tax is sent to the states, to fill up their treasuries to 10000. Once that is done, the rest is distributed to the university, roads, and misc.

properties.Title: Remembering Sales Tax Difference
properties.UserDescription: This section stores the current difference in sales tax between paid out and not paid out to the states in the salesTaxDifference custom stat

properties.Title: Distribution to States
properties.UserDescription: Once per hour, distribute money to the states
